title: srI mahaagaNapathim bajEham
sahitya:
shrI mahAgaNapatim bhajEham shivAtmajam SaNmukhAgrajam



anupallavi



shrta gaNasEvitam vighna nAshakam vara prasAda dAyakam



madhyama kaalam



sadayam kapilamuni varadAyakam guru sEva shaktam hErambam



caraNam 1



jnAna mudrAlankrtam mUlAdhAra nivAsinam



caraNam 2



gajAraNya vAsinam jyOtirmayam upaniSad sAram panca

 bhUtAtmakam sindhUrapriyam pancamAtanga mukham



caraNam 3



kAmEsha nayana hlAdakam nAgalinga vara putram

 shrI vidyA cit-prabhAnanda rAja yOgIndra vanditam
